output_list.reason: The transfer function does not check if the recipient balance will overflow. If the recipient balance is greater than the maximum possible value for a uint256, the transfer will fail. This can be exploited by an attacker to steal tokens from the recipient.

The transferFrom function does not check if the recipient balance will overflow. If the recipient balance is greater than the maximum possible value for a uint256, the transfer will fail. This can be exploited by an attacker to steal tokens from the recipient.

The burn function does not check if the total supply will overflow. If the total supply is greater than the maximum possible value for a uint256, the burn will fail. This can be exploited by an attacker to steal tokens from the contract.

The burnFrom function does not check if the total supply will overflow. If the total supply is greater than the maximum possible value for a uint256, the burn will fail. This can be exploited by an attacker to steal tokens from the contract.

The batchTransfer function does not check if the recipient balance will overflow. If the recipient balance is greater than the maximum possible value for a uint256, the transfer will fail. This can be exploited by an attacker to steal tokens from the recipient.
